title: Credit
description: The basics of credit cards, credit score, and how to use credit to your advantage.

slideTexts.maintext:
Credit is receiving money now with the promise that it will be repaid later.
            There are four main types of credit: 
            Revolving (Credit Cards)
            Charge Cards
            Service (Utilities, Memberships, Subscriptions)
            Installment (Car Loans, Home Mortgages)

A credit card allows you to borrow money to make charges up to a certain credit limit.
          If you pay back the borrowed money within a certain time frame, you do not have to pay anything extra.
